channel.title: [317]How to use Server to Client Packets?
channel.description: How do I use them? I want to make flashing icons (packet id 24) and also make packets such as 53. Would I do createFrame?

item.title: [317]How to use Server to Client Packets?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:453300”]For wL base servers.

public void sendFrame24() { if (c.getOutStream != null) { c.getOutStream().createFrame(24); ..other written vars here... c.flushOutStream(); } }[/quote]
I knew it! Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [317]How to use Server to Client Packets?

item.title: [317]How to use Server to Client Packets?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

For wL base servers.

public void sendFrame24() { if (c.getOutStream != null) { c.getOutStream().createFrame(24); ..other written vars here... c.flushOutStream(); } }
